inclusion.criterion: Has not experienced neck pain for the last 1 year
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Having had cervical spine and shoulder surgery
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Neck pain caused by different pathologies (tumor, rheumatoid arthritis, ankylosing spondylitis, fracture, dislocation)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 62-year-old African-American man with left upper and lower extremity weakness, dark visual spot in right eye, facial numbness, facial drop and slurred speech. No dyspnea, headache, palpitations, chest pain, fever, dizziness, bowel or urinary incontinence, loss of consciousness.
